name: pocketbase
description: PocketBase is a backend-as-a-service in a single executable. It offers database, auth, file storage, and real-time API, ideal for building self-hosted app backends quickly.

features.title: Authentication
features.description: User authentication with email/password, OAuth2, and custom auth providers

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Upload and serve files with automatic thumbnail generation and access control

features.title: REST API
features.description: Subscribe to database changes with WebSocket connections for live updates

features.title: Rest Api
features.description: Automatically generated REST API for all database collections with filtering and sorting

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Manage database schema, users, and settings through a web-based admin panel
